body:
i think avicore sucks, ALOT, they added 2 games, the lobby is way too big, and its boring, the website looks like garbage to me, im angry, i miss Mczone

1.hackers 
2.XP rollback
3.The classic maps have been butchered.. diamond replaced with gold...
4.Super glitchy games... even if all monuments are destroyed... the game doesn't end.
5.I get Kicked from avicade ALOT while waiting
6.All the new maps are just rip offs from Hyperscale, and new maps have nothing to do with playability
7.Why all the GOLD?!!!
8.Bad hub
9.No more Donor Flight
10.rank are WAAAY over priced no rank on ANY server should ever cost 100 dollars

i waited and i waited, and everyone hyped and hyped. its just garbage, its not that great

people need to stop worshiping avicus, they are a dying server, and a shell of what mczone once was, they took something that everyone loved and just ruined it, they are not cutting edge, they are not innovating, they are pretty much just a whole lot of hot air.

they silence you when you dont agree with them and the whole communtiy attacks you when you call them out on there BS, avicus just isnt as good as it pretends to be, and im tired of watching everyone constantly follow these jokers like its there religion or something

infact i give up on Avicus, im going back to Mineplex

4.Super glitchy games... even if all monuments are destroyed... the game doesn't end.
5.I get Kicked from avicade ALOT while waiting
6.All the new maps are just rip offs from Hyperscale, and new maps have nothing to do with playability
7.Why all the GOLD?!!!
8.Bad hub
9.No more Donor Flight
10.rank are WAAAY over priced no rank on ANY server should ever cost 100 dollars

i waited and i waited, and everyone hyped and hyped. its just garbage, its not that great

people need to stop worshiping avicus, they are a dying server, and a shell of what mczone once was, they took something that everyone loved and just ruined it, they are not cutting edge, they are not innovating, they are pretty much just a whole lot of hot air.

they silence you when you dont agree with them and the whole communtiy attacks you when you call them out on there BS, avicus just isnt as good as it pretends to be, and im tired of watching everyone constantly follow these jokers like its there religion or something

infact i give up on Avicus, im going back to Mineplex
title: Avicus 90% Hype 10%Fun

replies.body:
I have to agree with the innovation part honestly. I liked Avicus because it was different than a lot of servers I played on. 
The forums update (which I love) and the punishment update are making it more and more like OCN, which I don't want to happen with this server.
I haven't had a chance to play in game yet, but I do see what you mean, Avicus is not being innovative with the forums and punishment system right now.
Also, the bar up top is now pretty much identical to OCN, the leaderboards are the same. The only thing I like and is original with this update are the profiles.
replies.body_tagged:
I have to agree with the innovation part honestly. I liked Avicus because it was different than a lot of servers I played on. 
The forums update (which I love) and the punishment update are making it more and more like OCN, which I don't want to happen with this server.
I haven't had a chance to play in game yet, but I do see what you mean, Avicus is not being innovative with the forums and punishment system right now.
Also, the bar up top is now pretty much identical to OCN, the leaderboards are the same. The only thing I like and is original with this update are the profiles.

dont get me wrong the maps are nice yes, but there are not original

replies.body:
1. Hackers are being dealt with. And from what I can see, quite effectively.
2. XP isn't rolled back?
3.There are MCZone only Nebula lobbies.
4. I've experienced one glitch. That's pretty amazing considering the massive update was just released today (yesterday for some).
5. Er.. I don't know?
6. Hyperscale was paid to make the hubs. These lobbies are not found on any other server.
7. Why not? :P
8.I think the hub is amazing. Personal opinion though.
9. Really not too big of a deal :c
10. It's your choice whether or not you want to buy a donor rank. Many people have bought diamond.

replies.body:
From what I can see, it was an immense amount of coding. Funky had to compile all of the game modes into one plugin while implementing new maps and kits.

Also, the fantastic website that was completely redesigned. I'd say it was quite a large update and was completely worth the wait.

replies.body:
1.hackers - There has always been hackers on any large server. 
2.XP rollback - This is simply another bug that needs to be ironed out. 
3.The classic maps have been butchered.. diamond replaced with gold... - We've decided to reduce the diamond on each map for more enjoyable gameplay for all, and not just for those in diamond. 
4.Super glitchy games... even if all monuments are destroyed... the game doesn't end. - Again, we've only just released this new update, there will be a few bugs.
5.I get Kicked from avicade ALOT while waiting - Explain?
6.All the new maps are just rip offs from Hyperscale, and new maps have nothing to do with playability - Pretty sure it doesn't exactly matter what they look like...its just minecraft. 
7.Why all the GOLD?!!! - See Above
8.Bad hub - A lot of people like it, thanks for expressing you're opinion
9.No more Donor Flight - I dont get it either, is it that big of a deal? Also you're not even a donator...
10.rank are WAAAY over priced no rank on ANY server should ever cost 100 dollars - Evidently you haven't seen the prices or any large server network. If you dont want to pay it, that is absolutely fine, but some people really want to support the server.
replies.body_tagged:
1.hackers - There has always been hackers on any large server. 
2.XP rollback - This is simply another bug that needs to be ironed out. 
3.The classic maps have been butchered.. diamond replaced with gold... - We've decided to reduce the diamond on each map for more enjoyable gameplay for all, and not just for those in diamond. 
4.Super glitchy games... even if all monuments are destroyed... the game doesn't end. - Again, we've only just released this new update, there will be a few bugs.
5.I get Kicked from avicade ALOT while waiting - Explain?
6.All the new maps are just rip offs from Hyperscale, and new maps have nothing to do with playability - Pretty sure it doesn't exactly matter what they look like...its just minecraft. 
7.Why all the GOLD?!!! - See Above
8.Bad hub - A lot of people like it, thanks for expressing you're opinion
9.No more Donor Flight - I dont get it either, is it that big of a deal? Also you're not even a donator...
10.rank are WAAAY over priced no rank on ANY server should ever cost 100 dollars - Evidently you haven't seen the prices or any large server network. If you dont want to pay it, that is absolutely fine, but some people really want to support the server.

replies.body_tagged: It's funny how you say "almost all the maps are rip offs from Hyperscale" when the only ones we have (and Hyperscale was paid for them) are Volcano, Fantasy, Magma, Mystic (which is worth mentioning was removed from the rotations) and the new lobby.

replies.body:
Half of your facts are incorrect, tripplecs.
Go ahead, play on a different server. No one is stopping you!
Let's go on your list, shall we?

Hackers
Every Network will have some.

XP rollback  
There weren't "rollbacks" from what I've seen. Besides, if there were; it would be a bug (which would be fixed soon).

The classic maps have been butchered.. diamond replaced with gold...
I suggest you stop thinking about yourself getting kills. Having a team with full diamond armour, then spawn camping is NOT fun for the other team. It was to make gameplay FAIR. Look fair up on Google.

Super glitchy games... even if all monuments are destroyed... the game doesn't end.
Again, Avicore just released. Why are you expecting Avicore to be perfect?

I get Kicked from avicade ALOT while waiting
Report these bugs to the Avicus Github.... 

All the new maps are just rip offs from Hyperscale, and new maps have nothing to do with playability 
 The maps are played out very nicely! Obviously you don't spend enough time on them to understand how each map works.

Why all the GOLD?!!!
Some users love this server, so they donate! Problem?

Bad hub
 Again, an opinion. You're making this sound like a fact thread. 

No more Donor Flight 
Why do you care? This does not effect you in anyway. 

Rank are WAAAY over priced no rank on ANY server should ever cost 100 dollars
Gold and Emerald are approximately the same price as Mineplex and OCN. There are servers that are way more expensive...

Again, Avicore just released. Why are you expecting Avicore to be perfect?

I get Kicked from avicade ALOT while waiting
Report these bugs to the Avicus Github.... 

All the new maps are just rip offs from Hyperscale, and new maps have nothing to do with playability 
 The maps are played out very nicely! Obviously you don't spend enough time on them to understand how each map works.

Why all the GOLD?!!!
Some users love this server, so they donate! Problem?

Bad hub
 Again, an opinion. You're making this sound like a fact thread. 

No more Donor Flight 
Why do you care? This does not effect you in anyway. 

Rank are WAAAY over priced no rank on ANY server should ever cost 100 dollars
Gold and Emerald are approximately the same price as Mineplex and OCN. There are servers that are way more expensive...

replies.body: I hate when people think we rip off OCN maps. To answer your inquiry about Abandoned Park, that is in no damn way even close to Abandoned Zoo. It has a different everything. We also have never had any OCN maps in our repository besides Ravaged, which was submitted by the mapmaker but another author wanted it to be taken out. Stop spreading false info and not knowing what you are talking about.
